meanings.definition: The state or quality of being complex.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the complexities of math problems can be challenging for students.
meanings.sent2: The complexities of the human brain are still not fully understood by scientists.
meanings.sent3: The complexities of planning a surprise party for my friend made me feel like a secret agent.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the complexities of life is like solving a never-ending puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The complexities of the legal system can be overwhelming for individuals without legal knowledge.

meanings.definition: Complicated or intricate details or elements.
meanings.sent1: The complexities of the plot in the movie confused some viewers.
meanings.sent2: The complexities of the new software require a thorough training session.
meanings.sent3: The complexities of assembling the furniture led to a few extra pieces left over.
meanings.sent4: The complexities of the painting revealed hidden symbols upon closer inspection.
meanings.sent5: The complexities of the recipe made it challenging for beginners to follow.
